Question.Subject: How many "non-believers" did the German Protestants (Anabaptist's)kill during the MÃ¼nster Rebellion?
Question.Content: During the months of trying to impose Anabaptist rule over the people how many executions were there? Is it true they were planning world domination. Another time Inrod, but God bless the Martyrs of the Vendean uprising. They had to become peaceful, or die. It was a little over 200 years ago.......... that is when they sought to dechristianize France..........sorry Paul
Question.ChosenAnswer: Who knows how many were killed, probably dozens. Then when a small army failed in an attack on Munster, 3000 died in the assault. Later, about 50,000 Anabaptists were killed as part of the reprisal. That is a dark time in Anabaptist history. I am ashamed of it, but it was 500 years ago.

Question.Subject: Where can i buy English food or drinks in MÃ¼nster OsnabrÃ¼ck area?
Question.ChosenAnswer: I agree with previous comments. Explore the local food and drinks and you might surprise yourself.

Question.Subject: What do you know about Berner MÃ¼nster?
Question.Content: Anything u want to tell is accaptable.
Question.ChosenAnswer:
i can't tell you much about the MÃ¼nster of Berne despite of being swiss. all the extensive descriptions are in german.
the most impressive fact is that there is a flat in the tower in a height of 61 meters (200 feet) for the guard of the tower. this flat was inhabited by a woman (picture on the link below) who was responsible for tourists (visitors of the MÃ¼nster) and other things until 2006. http://www.bernermuenster.ch/munster/m-bm-tour-tur.html
wikipedia has a good description of the history of the MÃ¼nster (in german, the english version isn't done yet). http://de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Berner_M%C3%BCnster
the best impression of the bernese MÃ¼nster you can get on youtube from this video. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HHikSrhX4dU

Question.Subject: Where can I buy chipotle and ancho chilies in MÃ¼nster, Germany?
Question.Content: I Need them for a mexican dish, thanks!!!!!!!
Question.ChosenAnswer:
You will have to buy the chipotle canned, in adobo sauce. Ancho chilies are dried poblano chilies, and are the common ingredient in Chili Powder (along with cumin in the cheaper brands of chili powder) so if you look for a high quality chili powder you will have the ancho.
probably not a lot of Hispanic markets in Munster......

Question.Subject: Was the worlds tallest church, the Ulm MÃ¼nster in Ulm, Germany, purposely spared in the bombing raids of WWII?
Question.Content: the bing headline caught my eye today so i checked out the world's talles stuff. on the tallest church's page, it stated that the church wasn't bombed in WWII. was this done purposely? did the allies spare the church because it was the tallest church, because it was a church, etc.? or did it just never get blown up?
Question.ChosenAnswer: Likely not. Bombing in world War II lacked in precision to an extremely immense proportion. It was serendipitous the church was not badly damaged.

Question.Subject: Value of grandfather clock, Ulmer-MÃ¼nster-Gong with castle design inside?
Question.Content: Need to know if this is very valuable or just old... help please! It's flat top and bottom, open on top and middle with big fat metal looking gongs and a castle in a metal or brass type design above.
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Very valuable and old...
Good luck1

Question.Subject: Football clubs near MÃ¼nster?
Question.Content:
I'll be spending a significant amount of time in MÃ¼nster for school, and I'm curious as to which Bundesliga football club is:
A. Most popular/followed in MÃ¼nster B. Closest to MÃ¼nster
Thanks
Question.ChosenAnswer: PreuÃen MÃ¼nster is a football club in MÃ¼nster (3. division). A special highlight is a match against VFL OsnabrÃ¼ck (3. division too) (mostly riot). OsnabrÃ¼ck is approx 60 km away from MÃ¼nster. In the 1. division plays Schalke 04 - 80 km from MÃ¼nster a very popular club, and Borussia Dortmund (German football champion 2010) - 70 km from MÃ¼nster. Schalke and Borussia are deadly enemies too. here are the several homepages http://www.scpreussen-muenster.de/ http://www.vfl.de/ http://www.schalke04.com/ http://www.bvb.de/ and here is the homepage of the German Bundesliga (in English) http://www.bundesliga.de/en/index.php?sid=37554514c26c58bf038b5bc039e62d0f

Question.Subject: How long does muenster cheese keep in the fridge?
Question.Content: Bought muenster cheese on the 10th of february. Would like to know if it is still good to eat? Its sliced cheese by the way.
Question.ChosenAnswer: As long as it isn't molded it is fine. If it gets dried out it is tough or hard, but it still is edible. If it isn't sliced even a little mold is fine, just trim of the molded portion and the rest is fine.

Question.Subject: How many calories are in a single slice of muenster cheese?
Question.Content: I get it deli cut,not the ones already in a package,the deli cut tastes way different from packaged.

Question.Subject: What do they use to make the outside of muenster cheese orange?
Question.Content: I ate muenster cheese at Christmas that didn't have the orange siding(i guess thats what you could call it). Yesterday I had some with the orange siding with some ill effects. Mind you, I have been eating muenster, or monster, cheese all my life, its my favorite
Question.ChosenAnswer: I believe it is paprika, it doesn't affect the flavor much, it is just for aesthetics. And no, it is not wax, that is only on Edam, or some cheddars
